授業方法:
Face-to-face format. All classes will be held in the classroom. This may change depending on the situation in April.
This class will be completed entirely in English. This course aims to improve students’ overall English abilities through engagement with academic topics. Students should come to class expecting to communicate with the instructor and other students entirely in English. Please note that students of any level can join this class, so the level of students will be mixed. the textbook we will be using is an intermediate level textbook (CEFR B1 or about 600 on the TOEIC).
